description: Try our easy to follow Broccoli Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Broccoli Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.66 cup reduced-fat grated tasty cheese, grated

recipeInstructions.text: Cook your favourite pasta in plenty of boiling water.
When nearly cooked, add the broccoli florets and cook until bright green and tender.
